Database Developer - Denver/Lakewood, Colorado Researcher for the National Park Service

We are looking for a motivated developer who enjoys working with spatial data. This individual will lead a project intended to increase the National Park Serviceâ€™s engagement with the open data community.

We use tools like: PostgreSQL, PostGIS, Node, JavaScript, and GitHub.
